Name: EXZEAL
About the game: A sequel that isn’t afraid to be different. Triangle Service’s EXZEAL is the followup to TRIZEAL Remix, but it’s much more than a simple rehash. Choose between multiple ships and specialize in each one’s weapon system. Will you focus on good old shooting, virtuously patient shot charging, or dangerous but powerful close-range attacks? In EXZEAL, it’s your choice. Features: 4+ different weapon systems to choose from Two-player local cooperative play Replay support Memorable soundtrack spanning multiple genres of music Includes Steam Achievements, Leaderboards, and Cloud saves
